mapper.select: SELECT BATTLE_NO ,KOR_AREA AS AREA ,CASE WHEN GENDER = 'A' THEN '남녀모두' WHEN GENDER = 'F' THEN '여자만' ELSE '남자만' END "GENDER" ,HOME_TEAM ,CASE WHEN "LEVEL" = 'E' THEN '무관' WHEN "LEVEL" = 'B' THEN '초보' WHEN "LEVEL" = 'M' THEN '중수' ELSE '고수' END "LEVEL" ,BATTLE_DATE ,CHANGE_NAME ,CASE WHEN "STYLE" = 'f4' THEN '4:4 자유형' WHEN "STYLE" = 'h4' THEN '4:4 혼영' WHEN "STYLE" = 'hg4' THEN '4:4 혼계영' END "STYLE" ,TITLE ,BATTLE_TIME FROM BATTLE JOIN AREA ON (AREA = ENG_AREA) WHERE BATTLE_DATE = #{cpage} ORDER BY BATTLE_TIME

SELECT BATTLE_NO ,KOR_AREA AS AREA ,GENDER ,HOME_TEAM ,AWAY_TEAM ,"LEVEL" ,TO_CHAR(BATTLE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "BATTLE_DATE" ,ORIGIN_NAME ,CHANGE_NAME ,STYLE ,TITLE ,BATTLE_TIME ,BATTLE_RULE FROM BATTLE JOIN AREA ON (AREA = ENG_AREA) WHERE BATTLE_NO = #{battleNo}
SELECT BATTLE_NO ,POOL_NAME ,LENGTH ,WIDTH ,LANES ,DEPTH ,PLACE ,YES_NO FROM POOL_INFO WHERE BATTLE_NO = #{battleNo}

SELECT TEAM_NO ,TEAM_NAME ,MEM_NO ,NICKNAME ,TEAM_MEMBER ,TEAM_INTRO ,ORIGIN_NAME ,CHANGE_NAME ,TEAM_AREA ,TEAM_TIME ,KEYWORD ,TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "CREATE_DATE" ,BADGE_ORIGIN_NAME ,BADGE_CHANGE_NAME ,BADGE_STATUS ,STATUS ,POWER_DURATION FROM TEAM JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND TEAM_NO = #{team}
SELECT BATTLE_NO ,VICTORY ,DEFEAT ,VIC_RECORD ,DEF_RECORD ,OK FROM BATTLE_RESULT WHERE BATTLE_NO = #{battleNo}

SELECT TEAM_NO ,WINNING_STREAK ,LOSING_STREAK ,VICTORY ,DEFEAT ,VICTORY + DEFEAT AS RECORD ,CASE WHEN VICTORY + DEFEAT = 0 THEN 0 -- 0으로 나누는 경우 예외처리 ELSE TRUNC((VICTORY / (VICTORY + DEFEAT)), 4) * 100 END AS WIN_RATE FROM RESULT_HISTORY WHERE TEAM_NO = #{team}
mapper.update: UPDATE BATTLE_RESULT SET OK = 'Y' WHERE BATTLE_NO = #{battleNO}
UPDATE RESULT_HISTORY SET WINNING_STREAK = WINNING_STREAK + 1 ,LOSING_STREAK = 0 ,VICTORY = VICTORY + 1 WHERE TEAM_NO = #{victoryTeamNo}
UPDATE RESULT_HISTORY SET WINNING_STREAK = 0 ,LOSING_STREAK = LOSING_STREAK + 1 ,DEFEAT = DEFEAT + 1 WHERE TEAM_NO = #{defeatTeamNo}
mapper.insert: UPDATE BATTLE SET AWAY_TEAM = '' WHERE BATTLE_NO = #{battleNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BATTLE WHERE AWAY_TEAM IS NULL AND BATTLE_NO = #{battleNo}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT TEAM_NO ,TEAM_NAME ,NVL(BADGE_CHANGE_NAME, 'resources/images/noBadge.png') "BADGE" ,WINNING_STREAK ,LOSING_STREAK ,VICTORY ,DEFEAT ,VICTORY + DEFEAT AS RECORD -- 전적 ,CASE WHEN VICTORY + DEFEAT = 0 THEN 0 -- 0으로 나누는 경우 예외처리 ELSE TRUNC((VICTORY / (VICTORY + DEFEAT)), 4) * 100 END AS WIN_RATE -- 승률 FROM RESULT_HISTORY LEFT JOIN TEAM USING(TEAM_NO) ORDER BY VICTORY DESC, WIN_RATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5
